      <p></p><div dir=3D"ltr">Hello,<br>
<br>
w=
e are happy to announce the release of JUnit 4.12-beta-1. There have been
 =
a lot of contributions by a full cast of contributors. Thanks to 
everyone =
who took part by reporting an issue, offering his/her opinion, 
or even sub=
mitting a pull request!<br>
<br>
We released a first beta version of 4.12. =
Therefore, we are kindly asking you to give it a try. If you 
find anything=
 we should consider, please let us know, either via this 
mailing list or d=
irectly on GitHub: <a rel=3D"nofollow" href=3D"https://github.com/KentBeck/=
junit/issues/512" target=3D"_blank">https://github.com/junit-team/junit/iss=
ues</a><br>
<br>
As usual, you can download the JARs or the complete ZIP fi=
le directly from <a rel=3D"nofollow" href=3D"https://github.com/KentBeck/ju=
nit/downloads." target=3D"_blank">https://github.com/junit-team/junit/relea=
ses/tag/r4.12-beta-1.</a> In addition, the jars have been submitted to Mave=
n Central.<br>



<br>
You can find the preliminary release notes on GitHub=
:<br>
<a rel=3D"nofollow" href=3D"https://github.com/KentBeck/junit/blob/ma=
ster/doc/ReleaseNotes4.11.txt" target=3D"_blank">https://github.com/junit-t=
eam/junit/blob/master/doc/ReleaseNotes4.12.md</a><br>

ciao,<br>
